discourse_list.title: The design rationale behind Parity/Substrate's WASM implementation

content.content: “Wasm on the Blockchain: The Lesser Evil” The full rationale, described within the context of requirements for blockchain VMs (secure, deterministic, generic, and efficient).    Medium – 19 Nov 18    Wasm on the Blockchain: The Lesser Evil – Polkadot Network – Medium Why Wasm? This blog post answers questions people have asked about our choice to use Wasm. Reading time: 13 min read       The Polkadot Network tweet that caught my attention: https://twitter.com/polkadotnetwork/status/1064550109965373440 Related:: eWASM’s design rationale document https://github.com/ewasm/design/blob/master/rationale.md.
content.GPT-summary: The post explains the design rationale behind Parity/Substrate's WASM implementation for blockchain VMs. It answers questions about why they chose to use Wasm and describes the requirements for blockchain VMs. The post also includes a link to eWASM's design rationale document. A tweet from the Polkadot Network is referenced, which caught the author's attention.
